Actions.Name: Tendril
Actions.Effects: Foe must save or be dazed.

Actions.Name: Pseudopod
Actions.Description: A character in range 3 is shoved 1 in a direction of the Ooze's choice.

Actions.Name: Slide
Actions.Description: The Ooze dashes 3 spaces. Foes it passes through take 1 damage.
Actions.Effects: Deals +1 damage and +1 dash for each time this ability was used this turn.
